name: 2020 Leagues Under The Sea
description:
*Warning*
This game requires a VR-Headset and a very large room.

This is also not a finished game, but a prototype, created for the global-game-jam 2020 with the topic repair.

In the year 2020 a dystopian future awaits humankind. Destructive storms and rising sea levels cause the planet surface to become uninhabitable and soon the world we knew ceased to exist. Technological advancements make life under water possible and even luxurious. On a journey through the vast oceans your submarine hull is breached. In a desperate attempt to save your life nothing is too extreme: rip the ship apart and plug every leak.
